caption.p: Differences in climate response from 1935–1964 to 1982–2011 of all juniper sites for monthly (current year January to December) and seasonal a) temperature means and b) precipitation sums. Sites within the region are sorted based on increasing longitude and within the region from high to low elevation (Kh. = Khaidarkan, S.C. = Sari Chelek, K.A. = Kyrgyz Ata). Seasons include previous year December to current year February (pDJF), March–May (MAM), June–July (JJ), June–August (JJA), September–November (SON), May–September (M–S), April–October (A–O), and the entire year.
Click here for additional data file.
